verses.name: Isaiah 60:1
verses.text: Arise, shine; for thy light is come, and the glory of the Lord is risen upon thee.

verses.name: Isaiah 60:2
verses.text: For, behold, the darkness shall cover the earth, and gross darkness the people: but the Lord shall arise upon thee, and his glory shall be seen upon thee.

verses.name: Isaiah 60:3
verses.text: And the Gentiles shall come to thy light, and kings to the brightness of thy rising.

verses.name: Isaiah 60:4
verses.text: Lift up thine eyes round about, and see: all they gather themselves together, they come to thee: thy sons shall come from far, and thy daughters shall be nursed at thy side.
